name: Kilzpacho
description:
Part of Ludum Dare 52

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/52/kilzpacho

Top down twin-stick-beatem-up harvesting mutant vegetables.

Description: Something got in your crops and now you have to do the right thing and rid the wild of all of your mutant veggies. When defeating enemies you get Cropses which can be used for upgrading stats between waves or harvested for upgrades and weapons later.

Controls:

Keyboard + Mouse

WASD = Strafe!

E/Q = Change Weapons

Mouse = Aim

Mouse1 = Attack

Space = Submit/Ability(If equipped)

L-Shift = Action

Gamepad (May work not fully tested)

Credits:

Aron Cruce, Christian MacDonald, Josh Gangl
